speaker: Freddie
dialog: Hey Jose how have you been?

speaker: Jose
dialog: I've been alright Freddie, how are you?

speaker: Freddie
dialog: I've been better, We need more friends!

speaker: Freddie
dialog: We are robots so technically we can create one right?

speaker: Jose
dialog: This is True, lets do it!

speaker: Freddie
dialog: First we should decide what characteristics they should have.
